alert.note: Alert for Eastern Highland; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 12:30PM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SUNDAY TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally up to 12 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Highland County. * WHEN...From 10 AM Sunday to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow could fall at 1 to 3 inches per hour for a time late Sunday, making roads nearly impassable for a time.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
